description:
As Jonouchi searches for a dueling opponent he stands a chance of beating, he finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai.  But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic-like ability, Jonouchi becomes totally flustered, leaving him no choice but to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 華麗なるハーピィ・レディ
